body: @genez, the test patch is https://go-review.googlesource.com/c/23512/. To pull it in to your local Go clone (which I assume you have, since you reported the issue still happens on tip), run `git fetch https://go.googlesource.com/go refs/changes/12/23512/1 && git checkout FETCH_HEAD`. Run it with `GODEBUG=gctrace=1` and it should print "long scanobject" messages with some useful details when things go wrong.
